00068     std::string
00069     atoms_file_name() const
00070     { return A_atoms_fname; }
00071 
00073     std::string
00074     ligand_file_name() const
00075     { 
00076 
00077       // Check if a ligand was specified at creation time
00078       if(A_lig_fname == "NONE") return "NONE";
00079 
00080       // Check A_site_path first, since the ligand could be in the same
00081       // directory as the site map
00082       std::string my_lig = A_site_path + "/" + A_lig_fname;
00083       if(!normal_file_exists(my_lig, false)){
00084         my_lig = A_dbase_ligs + "/" + A_lig_fname;
00085 
00086         if(!normal_file_exists(my_lig, false)){
00087           std::cerr << "Unable to find the file: " << my_lig << "\n";
00088           return "NOT_FOUND";
00089         }
00090       }
00091       return my_lig;
00092     }   
00093

00156     size_t
00157     fit_points_size() const
00158     { 
00159       return (hbond_pts->fit_pts_end() - hbond_pts->fit_pts_beg()) 
00160         + hphob_pts->size();
00161     }

00183     inline void
00184     revert()
00185     {
00186       hbond_pts->revert();
00187       hphob_pts->revert();
00188       A_bind_site_res->revert();
00189     }
00190 
00193     inline my_float_t
00194     compute_RMSD() const
00195     { 
00196       // This function was built for ease of use and not speed
00197       my_float_t hbond_sum = 0.0;
00198       if(hbond_pts->fit_pts_size() > 0) hbond_sum = hbond_pts->compute_RMSD();
00199       my_float_t hphob_sum = 0.0;
00200       if(hphob_pts->size() > 0) hphob_sum = hphob_pts->compute_RMSD();
00201       hbond_sum *= hbond_sum * hbond_pts->fit_pts_size();
00202       hphob_sum *= hphob_sum * hphob_pts->size();
00203       size_t N = hbond_pts->fit_pts_size() + hphob_pts->size();
00204       if(N == 0) return my_float_max;
00205       return std::sqrt((hbond_sum + hphob_sum) / N);
00206     }
00207 
00209     inline void
00210     transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00211     {
00212       hbond_pts->transform(R, T);
00213       hphob_pts->transform(R, T);
00214       A_bind_site_res->transform(R, T);
00215     }
00216 
00219     inline void
00220     inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00221     {
00222       hbond_pts->inverse_transform(R, T);
00223       hphob_pts->inverse_transform(R, T);
00224       A_bind_site_res->inverse_transform(R, T);
00225     }
